curam.util.client.view

Interface RendererContract


  • public interface RendererContract

    Defines the contract between renderers when one renderer re-uses another. The enclosing renderer will invoke the enclosed renderer. The enclosing renderer may require that the enclosed renderer provide access to the values of its properties associating property names with the names of topics to which the values will be published when they are changed.

    For example, a date selector renderer may re-use a text field renderer and require that the text field renderer provide the name of the topic to which the value of the text field's "text" property will be published. The date selector can then either subscribe to this topic to be notified of changes, or can read this topic on demand, when it needs to get the initial value to use for its pop-up calendar control. It can then publish back to this topic to set the value to the date returned from that pop-up calendar.

    • Method Detail

      • provide

        void provide(java.lang.String property,
             java.lang.String topicID)
        TODO: Fix this Javadoc. -- DG Registers the identifier of a control that this renderer provides to any other renderer that wishes to reuse this renderer. The identified control corresponds to the property defined in this renderer's contract.
        Parameters:
        property - The name of the property that is provided.
        topicID - The topic ID of the control that maintains the value.

      • require

        java.lang.String require(java.lang.String property)
                  throws ClientException
        Gets the identifier of the control associated with the named property. If no such property has been provided, an exception is thrown.
        Parameters:
        property - The name of the property that is required.
        Returns:
        The identifier of the control associated with that property.
        Throws:
        ClientException - If the property was not provided.

      • relay

        void relay(java.lang.String fromTopic,
           java.lang.String toTopic)
        Relays all values published to the first topic to the second topic also.
        Parameters:
        fromTopic - The topic to which the value is published.
        toTopic - The topic to which the value is relayed.

      • postProcessRequired

        void postProcessRequired()
        Indicates that the output of this renderer contained XIM markup and will require further processing.

      • createSubcontract

        RendererContract createSubcontract()
        Creates a new subcontract from this contract.
        Returns:
        The new subcontract.
